We can help you save energy, reduce your bill and stay safe.

EDITION: WINTER UPDATE FEBRUARY 2022

Stay on top of the season
Hi %%firstname%%,

Whether you like to bundle up and brave the cold, or get under a blanket and hunker down indoors, this month’s newsletter is full of helpful tips on how to save money and stay safe throughout the winter. So grab a hot chocolate, get cozy and read on to learn more!

Save with insulation

Find out how to reduce your home heating costs and energy usage with proper air sealing and insulation.
Learn more about how proper insulation can save you money

Save with insulation

Find out how to reduce your home heating costs and energy usage with proper air sealing and insulation.
Learn more about how proper insulation can save you money
 

Need bill relief?

For Ontarians who are behind on their bills, the Low-Income Energy Assistance Program (LEAP) now offers assistance up to $1,200.
Learn more about the low income energy assistance program

Need bill relief?

For Ontarians who are behind on their bills, the Low-Income Energy Assistance Program (LEAP) now offers assistance up to $1,200.
Learn more about the low income energy assistance program
 

Get storm ready

From outage alerts to checklists, find all the information you need on preparing for storms and the work we do to restore power safely.
Learn more about how to prepare for a storm

From outage alerts to checklists, find all the information you need on preparing for storms and the work we do to restore power safely.

Safety first

We’re giving back to our communities by teaching them how to stay safe – and play safe. See how we’re investing in a safer Ontario.
Learn more about our community investment program

Safety first

We’re giving back to our communities by teaching them how to stay safe – and play safe. See how we’re investing in a safer Ontario.
Learn more about our community investment program
 

Helping those in need

Everyone deserves a warm, safe bed. That's why we're donating 45 of them to Habitat for Humanity Huronia in Barrie.

Helping those in need

Everyone deserves a warm, safe bed. That's why we're donating 45 of them to Habitat for Humanity Huronia in Barrie.
